data.text: Luvutudila Yave matondo bila niandi widi wumboti ;
Bika Iseli katuba :
Bika nzo yi Aloni yituba :
Bika bobo beti kinzika Yave batuba ;
Ku tsi ziphasi ziama, ndiyamikina kuidi Yave,
Yave widi ku ndambuꞌama, ndilendi mona tsisi ko.
Yave widi ku ndambuꞌama, niandi nsadisi ama ;
Bulutidi mboti mu suaminanga mu Yave
Bulutidi mboti mu suaminanga mu Yave
Makanda moso manzungidila
Mawu manzungidila, ku ndambu ka ndambu
Mawu manzungidila banga ziniosi,
Bandunguna ku mbusa muingi ndibua
Yave niandi zingolo ziama ayi nkungꞌama ;
Yamikina ku khini ayi ku ndungunu kulembo wakana
Koko ku lubakala ku Yave kuidi ku zangama ngolo ;
Ndilendi fua ko vayi ndiela zinga
Yave wuphana thumbudulu mu kingolo ;
Nzibudila mielo mi busonga,
Wawu, wawu muelo wu Yave,
Ndiela kuvutudila matondo
Ditadi diloza mintungi diyika
Yave wuvanga diambu diodi
Kiaki kiawu lumbu kivanga Yave,
A Yave, wutuvukisa !
Bika kasakumunu mutu wowo wunkuizila mu dizina di Yave ;
Yave niandi Nzambi ayi niandi wutukienzula ;
Ngeyo Nzambi ama ayi ndiela kuvutudila matondo.
Luvutudila Yave matondo bila niandi widi wumboti,
